item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260226)
item.description:
What's New

fix: prevent invalid circumflex in multi-vowel groups (insertAOE)

When typing double vowels (oo→ô, aa→â, ee→ê) in a multi-vowel group,

validate the post-transform vowel sequence before applying circumflex.

Bug: typing 'caoto' produced 'caôt' because the vowelTable pattern

[KEYO, KEYT] matched, but [a, ô] is not a valid Vietnamese sequence.

Fix: simulate the circumflex transform and check if the resulting

vowel sequence is valid via VowelSequenceValidator. If invalid,

fallback to insertKey instead of adding circumflex.

Added 9 test cases covering:

  • Bug fix: caoto → caoto (not caôt)
  • Block: toata, toana (invalid [o, â]), noete (invalid [o, ê])
  • Regression: tooi→tôi, coot→côt, boot→bôt, thoong→thông, xoong→xông
